Class Grader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Grader
public class Grader
extends java.lang.Object

Executes a number of "rabbit hunts", in which a fox moves around a field containing bushes, looking for a rabbit, and prints out the percentage of times that the rabbit escapes.
